name: Ball Buster TD
description:
A fun ,short tower-defence game in which you smash some balls .

Simply select a tower which you want to place ( if you can afford it ) and place it on one of the platforms . Their height is indicated by their color or rather their brightness.

If a tower is places on the lowest level then they wont be able to shoot over platforms that are higher than itself. There are many different kinds of tower , but you will have to unlock them while you play. Luckily the progress of unlocking is saved . ( locally per browser & device ...)
All controls are done with the mouse !

You can view stats of towers and enemies by clicking on "info" and then clicking on the thing you want info about.
In much the same way can you delete Towers and edit them with the "Edit" and "Delete" option.
Editing Towers is only their behavior as of now.

The audio might be a little too loud, you can change the volume in the settings ( menu).

Have fun !
and be sure to comment any ideas you have for the game or problems you have discovered.
